cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Check out this month's update to Xperience by Kentico. We’ve added in-product, interactive guidance and support from AIRA, support for web pages with multiple vanity URLs, more Email Builder capabilities, and fast track deployments to Xperience by Kentico SaaS! But, of course that's not all, so dive in and learn about the updates we've just delivered in Xperience by Kentico.

want to craft and control their company's presence in digital channels. Part of that experience involves the URLs that drive traffic to product and campaign landing pages on a website.

Control over these URLs is important for SEO and offline marketing where a short, memorable, and catchy URL increases the chances that customers will later visit a page.

URL management in Xperience by Kentico matured significantly when we first added support for [web page vanity URLs in 2024](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-september-19-2024#vanity-urls). Marketers were always able to customize the slug of a web page, but they didn't have full control over the entire URL path - vanity URLs made that possible, although web pages could only have a single vanity URL.

Based on [roadmap feedback](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/5-released) from partners and customers, you now have the ability to create multiple vanity URLs for a web page with an easy-to-use data table.

","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"9fda08f4-c4c8-43d6-8626-542790afcad8"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"9d0c56fe-6820-4020-945b-ac248cd6d9f8","markdownStyle":"0c350c55-2175-4018-a219-ad9703dbbe28","markdownStyleParsed":"24f0fb2d-24d2-4612-a8b7-1c134cb380c2","markdownCodeLanguage":"1a82c8f2-6ce7-4cb2-8d17-5352e8626a7c","id":"7dd70d03-f995-4c7d-be19-53f9b6f27ed0"}}]},{"identifier":"03755061-4e21-4152-99f0-dfc8d162ff8f","type":"CommunityPortal.VideoWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"bade4872-481f-48bc-a283-c34ceedd1de2","properties":{"selectedVideos":[{"identifier":"657c3fa4-0015-4e70-90f3-67f0d5008574"}],"videoAlignment":"Center","videoAlignmentParsed":1,"size":"Large","sizeParsed":2,"showDescriptionAsCaption":false,"id":"166496ee-206b-40e7-b3aa-70b5c4495b64"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"selectedVideos":"9553a602-0bc1-480f-a316-c3aba602e602","videoAlignment":"87a0c9e7-44a5-47d2-a009-e99d74078e68","videoAlignmentParsed":"29a59830-c15c-440e-b596-0f81c6ca6d7b","size":"ff748643-3827-4e6a-ad9d-07c78b6636f6","sizeParsed":"b9cc67b8-1e2e-4c88-87a6-c97685fa9dfd","showDescriptionAsCaption":"27918c04-768e-4a18-92ce-5047730bfcc2","id":"0ff13cb6-dc97-4627-afc6-a0bc6d5bc89f"}}]},{"identifier":"14666bed-c49f-4d2f-87b7-e16688af3dc6","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"bfe01302-1d8a-47a4-baf3-0f3ba7b38720","properties":{"markdown":"Once a marketer has an Email Builder set up the way they want with template properties, sections, and widgets, and would like to use this email as a quick starting point in the future, they can save it as [a preset email template](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/digital-marketing/emails/create-emails-in-email-builder/email-builder-templates#email-builder-template-types).

Now that we have presets templates for both the Email Builder and Page Builder we renamed the **Preset page templates** application on the administration dashboard to **Preset templates**. Inside this app marketers can review and manage presets templates for both builders.

All of these features put marketers in the driver's seat of authoring email experiences, but marketers also want to balance control over experiences with responsibility for getting the technical details of those experiences right.

Developers can now help guide marketers to use Email Builder components in the correct locations of a email template using the restrictions of the `<EditableArea>` and `<WidgetZone>` razor components.

```HTML
@using Kentico.VisualBuilderComponents.Rcl.Components

@namespace DancingGoat.EmailComponents

<mj-section padding="0">
 <mj-column width="100%" padding="0px 10px">
 <WidgetZone 
 ZoneName="Widget_Zone_0" 
 AllowedWidgets="[DancingGoatTextWidget.IDENTIFIER]"/>
 </mj-column>
</mj-section>

```

This feature lets you see the placeholder-personalized subject and preview text of an email as it would be displayed in your recipient's inbox.

Our [Email Builder MJML integration](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/development/builders/email-builder/develop-email-builder-components#mjml-markup) helps ensure your emails display correctly across many email clients, but advanced component customizations (like [supporting dark-mode](https://www.litmus.com/blog/the-ultimate-guide-to-dark-mode-for-email-marketers)) could require more advanced previews and inbox testing.

You could [send draft emails](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/business-users/digital-marketing/emails#send-draft-emails) to various internal recipients and have them report back to you the email rendering experience or you could use our additional preview mode supports this workflow by copying the rendered HTML of the email and pasting it into an email delivery testing service like [Email on Acid's email testing](https://www.emailonacid.com/email-testing/) or [Litmus email testing](https://www.litmus.com/email-testing).

month's Refresh brings AIRA, our AI-powered assistant integrated into Xperience by Kentico, front and center for marketers in Xperience's administration UI.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"67e5111e-2507-4183-be7f-95691248b3ee"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"37457735-9249-450b-8e4b-670295aa540e","markdownStyle":"1c58c44c-0649-4e04-b1af-ce0ab8736aba","markdownStyleParsed":"a65bdb09-96d0-45f0-9fdc-e7d234ff7426","markdownCodeLanguage":"eed3ccbc-f6a0-491a-8696-f37d595a3d33","id":"3980a119-deb8-4846-b892-cef66f14fa47"}}]},{"identifier":"fad7ff00-81aa-459a-a15d-5a425a15e0f0","type":"CommunityPortal.VideoWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"fcdb1938-f90e-44fc-ad45-9b32a67e3d27","properties":{"selectedVideos":[{"identifier":"a1ab4c7b-ed13-4629-a80a-a7b42d2d03b8"}],"videoAlignment":"Center","videoAlignmentParsed":1,"size":"Large","sizeParsed":2,"showDescriptionAsCaption":true,"id":"018a63fa-3089-4c6f-b216-fc6c80246ad8"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"selectedVideos":"8353d65b-e65d-4d33-bde9-44be4e2d57f2","videoAlignment":"d0f1e64f-de88-4094-9fa7-889ee7972761","videoAlignmentParsed":"77bde65c-1203-46ca-8eea-3567c1c4d656","size":"334231d8-72b5-41ba-9852-a167c952da8c","sizeParsed":"9715a4cb-43f5-43b3-af39-6680cf4c6e9b","showDescriptionAsCaption":"5ba83d84-2a25-4701-b698-cdb4313c5655","id":"df091232-9dbd-407a-9c01-9e78c2c82e17"}}]},{"identifier":"7f18b9f8-4509-4587-933c-08c956b8e26a","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"040f3a50-b804-483f-aa7f-a77c9d1e9ba2","properties":{"markdown":"For any AIRA-enabled solutions, marketers will be able to quickly open an in-product chat experience from the sidebar on the right side of the screen.

Today, this AI chat experience is focused on education and guidance on how to use Xperience by Kentico, trained on our [recently revamped Kentico Learn Portal](https://docs.kentico.com/) and all of it's great educational content.

You can ask AIRA questions about where to find different features of Xperience by Kentico (like [role management](https://docs.kentico.com/x/7IVwCg)) and how to understand and use its many powerful capabilities (like [customer journeys](https://docs.kentico.com/x/customer_journeys_xp)).

Although the AIRA chat experience does not yet have access to your Xperience application context (content, data, links to pages) it will soon! All of this work is in preparation for our planned improvement to [empower marketers with insights about customer journeys with AIRA](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/251-customer-journey-insights-powered-by-aira).

deployments","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"2b3ed71f-683e-4f06-a06f-33bcfc95266b"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"2fe4634b-7ac9-420f-b953-f369c55499af","headingLevel":"669b1986-1315-448a-99ed-5fe823dfcbc2","headingLevelsParsed":"3e699a2a-e2c1-4ce0-add3-cd99e19f3950","headingAlignment":"5980e5b8-dda5-412d-8eb2-d6b5351bcf63","headingAlignmentsParsed":"2eb41b93-3599-4a1f-873a-988f1c33273a","showHeadingAnchor":"c2296ad2-6049-40ad-8b8a-4f91fbee11ed","id":"f301b002-214f-4342-850b-1604c2a678bb"}}]},{"identifier":"f993858a-cd3a-4119-aadf-7b604caf1564","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"e081862f-ab84-4e1d-922f-9235d9cf2688","properties":{"markdown":"Xperience by Kentico SaaS comes with pre-configured infrastructure for a customer's environments and pre-built deployment pipelines, integrated with the Xperience Portal Deployments dashboard.

Using SaaS, customers can get to market more quickly and follow a predictable project update, QA, and pre-production content authoring process.

What should teams do when they identify a critical bug in production that needs to be resolved? Yes, they can deploy to QA, then STG or UAT, and finally Production. Feature validation is always a trade-off of time vs quality.
","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"a16bfac6-871d-435b-a181-348182594323"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"b42efc19-75ef-4434-bdb3-327587c756e7","markdownStyle":"98a8e133-f501-4a25-aabe-0528270e5790","markdownStyleParsed":"5c2d71b7-f0fd-4540-a03b-3a7721113f10","markdownCodeLanguage":"e02d0c38-3469-4147-91f2-afdb2d5c4171","id":"7c2971c6-ec24-4178-8580-959a20948036"}}]},{"identifier":"44855841-f665-4711-a839-88f352240b56","type":"CommunityPortal.ImageWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"1928b7ff-1ddc-478f-9bcd-78ae8d2f67e3","properties":{"selectedImages":[{"identifier":"2da47844-7025-45d6-9a05-4a759a68c7e0"}],"alignment":"Center","alignmentParsed":1,"size":"Large","sizeParsed":2,"showDescriptionAsCaption":false,"linkToFullsizeImage":true,"id":"12a56eb3-35fa-422d-babc-8c21fec62d6c"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"selectedImages":"791eb6b5-7fb5-4e43-b2bd-ea486d8827cb","alignment":"16f35809-2223-4b06-bc79-f151dd3af3ce","alignmentParsed":"d489cacf-4386-42eb-b53f-9f5d54aa0822","size":"cde4dcdf-5f5d-4c64-9b99-24fe98fbd82f","sizeParsed":"f84c977d-2578-4892-9c7a-0f1fcd1dd734","showDescriptionAsCaption":"8584a362-a9f8-4a24-9ab8-e199fa03b907","linkToFullsizeImage":"69e6393f-9f61-416a-a61e-ff73b702f6b2","id":"2bcb39dc-98e6-417f-904c-b4af0c82c86e"}}]},{"identifier":"345a97d0-6791-4876-91a9-aea4b32fa61d","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"b8a017b2-b9dd-483f-8789-d28dfa8378d0","properties":{"markdown":"Xperience by Kentico SaaS customers can now deploy directly to _any_ environment with our [emergency deployments](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/deployment/deploy-to-the-saas-environment#deploy-emergency-fixes-to-the-saas-environment) feature.

This is available in the Xperience Portal on the deployments dashboard page, where teams can manually upload a [SaaS deployment package](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/deployment/deploy-to-the-saas-environment#create-a-deployment-package) to the environment of their choice (typically production for these scenarios).

For teams that have automated their build process in their own CI/CD pipeline, they can customize the SaaS package upload URL (as a pipeline variable) which is parameterized by environment.

* QA - [https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload/\<PROJECT\_GUID>/qa](https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload//qa)

* UAT - [https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload/\<PROJECT\_GUID>/uat](https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload//uat)

* STG - [https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload/\<PROJECT\_GUID>/stg](https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload//stg)

* PROD - [https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload/\<PROJECT\_GUID>/prod](<* \[https://xperience-portal.com/api/deployment/upload/](\<* \\\\/prod\>)\\/prod>)

We recommend only using this fast-track deployment technique in cases of critical bugs that can justify the direct deployment either because the fix is unlikely to cause further regressions or because the QA environment is in-use for other feature testing.

Due to this additional deployment flexibility we have added new deployment validation when promoting a deployment from one environment to the next. You will see this validation take effect if, for example, you deploy a hotfix to Production that isn't yet in QA and then attempt to promote QA's deployment to Production.

major part of the internal processes and workflows of digital commerce is order status configuration. The status of an order drives much of the marketer and customer experience.

If an order is in a failed status, we want to let the store administrator know so they can investigate and resolve the issue. If an order reaches the shipped status, we want to alert the customer with a confirmation email containing a shipment tracking number and link.

retriever","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"242fe89f-a7d8-476e-87bb-6962cfdb0e53"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"e0e3b03c-4745-447b-b905-11c32f7c0632","headingLevel":"8034338e-f0b4-42b9-9f89-216bf62ca434","headingLevelsParsed":"e9e83a74-675b-4730-9345-1bdb2c4ddc62","headingAlignment":"08e91401-17cc-4af2-8431-0a4d5db05383","headingAlignmentsParsed":"ad1fc115-c14a-40c6-97de-a42e48fc122c","showHeadingAnchor":"9e3b8f08-0987-4c36-b182-2e037d5199a0","id":"c2413d01-ea13-4521-9262-1078d46cc219"}}]},{"identifier":"cc30b828-9554-4e31-81db-b17595b08101","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"cde362b8-10bc-475b-8fb6-b6a5633bba87","properties":{"markdown":"Last month [we added auto-caching support](/blog/xperience-by-kentico-refresh-may-19-2025#content-retriever-caching) to the [new, in-preview content retriever API](https://docs.kentico.com/x/content_retriever_api_xp), which improves developer productivity significantly by reducing the amount of boilerplate code you need to author and maintain.

We received some additional feedback (thank you!) about the API, made several small improvements, and now we're happy to announce that the `IContentRetriever` is out of preview, fully supported, and production ready!

One of the recent improvements we made was [related to retrieving multiple content items](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/api/content-item-api/reference-content-retriever-api#retrieve-content-items-by-guids) by their `ContentItemGUID` value so that it better supports [the combined content selector](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/reference-admin-ui-form-components#combined-content-selector) when used to link web page content items.

For example, if you have an Email Builder card component and a marketer uses the widget's properties to select blog post, you can retrieve the selected page with the following code.

```CSharp
var pages = await ContentRetriever.RetrieveContentByGuids<BlogPostPage>(
 Properties.SelectedBlogPosts.Select(i => i.Identifier),
 new RetrieveContentParameters 
 { 
 LanguageName = emailContext.LanguageName, 
 IsForPreview = emailContext.BuilderMode != EmailBuilderMode.Off 
 });

var blogPost = pages.FirstOrDefault();
```

We now recommend you always use the **[combined content selector](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/reference-admin-ui-form-components#combined-content-selector)** (which uses the **[Pages and reusable content](https://docs.kentico.com/x/RoXWCQ)** field data type) over the **[Page selector](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/developers-and-admins/customization/extend-the-administration-interface/ui-form-components/reference-admin-ui-form-components#page-selector)** (which uses the Pages field data type), even when linking web pages in a content item field.

Another improvement we recently made was to the lower level [Object query API](https://docs.kentico.com/x/OYXWCQ) `GetListResult/GetListResultAsync` methods. These methods get the query result as a list of values from the first column that the query returns, are used extensively inside Xperience, and have been optimized for improved performance!

Go ahead and try the new `IContentRetriever` today!

","markdownStyle":"Standard","markdownStyleParsed":0,"markdownCodeLanguage":"","id":"e06fd92e-49a1-4ac8-8bb7-ca8afd3a0e17"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"markdown":"5d186f6f-5ce3-4a68-bccc-995722e83741","markdownStyle":"43b95e41-c126-470c-8dd2-ace06e691bca","markdownStyleParsed":"e7a63d35-c03d-4be3-9515-9c24500b05c4","markdownCodeLanguage":"6034e7d4-b367-41e2-9fb5-4df6b6771cfc","id":"a5c00f15-f0c1-47d9-a5a7-9d87c92d4bd5"}}]},{"identifier":"bea48d4a-6022-4f68-af88-5356c803bdf0","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"8d4e9347-f015-4927-8f99-0fe007840057","properties":{"markdown":"Dancing Goat's refactor to replace all of its custom caching, repository pattern, and use of `IContentItemQueryBuilder` was completed almost entirely through [Cursor](https://www.cursor.com/)'s agent mode using the [o4-mini model](https://openai.com/index/introducing-o3-and-o4-mini/), guided by one of our engineers.

With the right prompts, context, and iterative process we were able to complete a complex refactoring in significantly less time, letting our team focus on adding features to Xperience by Kentico.

Expect a future blog post with details about this AI development experience.

So, now it's visible! We hope you find it useful.

next?","headingLevel":"H2","headingLevelsParsed":1,"headingAlignment":"Left","headingAlignmentsParsed":0,"showHeadingAnchor":true,"id":"299ec356-0534-409d-914a-9d2d847fb451"},"fieldIdentifiers":{"headingText":"01cb51ae-689b-45f9-b563-09fd5d90e369","headingLevel":"5ea92e06-c065-4a8a-adad-a3e7c1236cf9","headingLevelsParsed":"e5d85837-814b-4f28-8465-b9d5cec57303","showHeadingAnchor":"e54ff62c-71fa-4b7e-8119-ec791aec0c74","headingAlignment":"332becff-c323-4930-9884-c99db26a7027","headingAlignmentsParsed":"90893b06-587b-4904-81df-abcaf2100c02","id":"62f6ba74-b1ed-4be0-9a8e-7b68f3ad9b48"}}]},{"identifier":"4712de43-8955-4b57-8c73-63335b5636ac","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"2e17faef-b100-4c39-8f7a-befc9fc485e8","properties":{"markdown":"As always, check out the [Changelog in our documentation](https://docs.kentico.com/documentation/changelog#refresh-june-12-2025) for the full Refresh feature and technical details.

We hope these new capabilities, features, and API improvements unlock solutions for you. Try them out, [let us know](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes) 👋 what you think.

For [the next Refresh](https://roadmap.kentico.com/tabs/6-next-refreshes), here's just half of what we're planning!

* [Media library migration support](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/279-migrating-media-library-items-to-content-hub-media-library-sunset), to help customers seamlessly adopt the Content hub for digital asset management.

* [Basic Admin UI localization](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/265-basic-localization-support-for-admin-ui), so teams can enable non-native English speakers using the Xperience administration UI.

* [Web page content sync](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/280-content-sync-xbyk-s-answer-to-content-staging-phase-2-pages), allowing marketers to author full web experiences in pre-production environments.

* [Production ready digital commerce](https://roadmap.kentico.com/c/269-lightweight-digital-commerce-production-release), for teams ready to build their digital commerce solutions with Xperience by Kentico.

These updates will, as always, accompany a number of UX and developer-focused improvements.

Check back next month for another Xperience by Kentico Refresh review!

cms.contentitemcommondata.WebPageMetaShortDescription: Check out this month's update to Xperience by Kentico. We’ve added in-product, interactive guidance and support from AIRA, support for web pages with multiple vanity URLs, more Email Builder capabilities, and fast track deployments to Xperience by Kentico SaaS! But, of course that's not all, so dive in and learn about the updates we've just delivered in Xperience by Kentico.
